item.title: Cell culture tips
item.description: As my postdoc / mentor likes to say, Trust no one. (only applies to cell culture, not to life in general)

item.title: Flow Cytometry
item.description: Helpful animated video Takeaways from video Flow cytometry is an experimental technique used to count and analyze individual cells within a mixed population based on their size, shape, and other properties.

item.title: For Blood and Money
item.description: Overview Focuses on the biotech industry, billionaires, and the pursuit of blockbuster drugs. Explores the story of Acerta Pharma, Imbruvica, Calquence, and their role in revolutionizing blood cancer treatment.
